name: 姓名
billingUpdateError: 目前無法更新您的帳單資料。請稍後再試。
makeDefault: 將此設為我的默認帳單資料。
movePrepubOrders: Move all pending Pre-Pub orders and Community Pricing bids to this card.
movePreorders: Move all pending Preorders and Community Pricing bids to this card.
movePaymentPlans: 將所有未完成的付款計劃移至該卡。
moveSubscriptions: 將所有當前的訂閱移到該卡。
fetchStates: 根據國家/地區獲取州名
fetchAddressFormat: 根據指定國家/地區，獲取地址格式
expirationDateError: 請輸入有效的到期日期
beforeRemoving: 在取消您的卡之前，請確保：
moveSubscriptionsToAlternate: 取消當前訂閱或將其移動到備用信用卡。
movePaymentPlansToAlternate: 將未結付款計劃移至備用信用卡。
movePreordersToAlternate: Cancel or move Preorders to an alternate credit card.
movePrepubsToAlternate: Cancel or move Pre-Pub orders to an alternate credit card.
moveCommunityPricingBidsToAlternate: Cancel or move Community Pricing bids to an alternate credit card.
conflict: Credit card authorization declined. We are unable to use the selected credit card. Please contact your bank or try a different card.
